title: A personal Vendetta proclamation against Meddler.
body:
I remember those mornings. I'd peel the sopping wet newspaper from my groin and relieve myself on the cold Oregon river banks. The police would stare, though they knew they'd gain nothing from arresting the shell of a man I'd become. 

It wasnt long ago when I was crowned "Jesus of the Boards"

Nearly 5 minutes ago. 

Oh how time has passed, Oh, How  {{champion:26}}  can be so cruel. 

Riot cactopus faded into the fogged corners of my mind. His child-like fear palpable in the air. I knew he could no longer haunt my thoughts... but who was that enshadowed figure that hovered over me. His mere presence bringing pressure like no other to rest upon my shoulders. 

_"Meddler"_

I'd hear them whisper. The shadows alive with the ghastly imprint of my previous failures. 

They called me crazy. Every one of them. They looked on me with those judging eyes and passed whispers of "the man who speaks to shadows." {{champion:56}} 

I'm not crazy, they call for me, I know they do. They speak the name of the creature that has a stranglehold on all I hold dear. 

If Cactopus took my wife, kids, and the game I love, then the beast they speak of has taken the remains of what made me human. I no longer wish to be the shell of a man, the shed skin of a sickly serpent waiting for my inevitable passing. 

_"Meddler"_

I can only ignore their calling for so long. They are growing tired of waiting for the opportune time.

I will see you soon Meddler. 

{{sticker:sg-syndra}}

replies.body:
Good luck have fun, but if you're open to advice, don't BM next time. It's not very classy.

Take my upvote though, and godspeed to the front of the boards. +1

hey sorry if it came across like that. Me and cactopus were hyping it up. the bm was a part of that. no hard feelings between anyone. 

(Except me and that tech desk intern.... He's on my list now)

Its all in good fun.
honestly you should've bm'ed harder after the spanking you gave me {{sticker:sg-zephyr}}

You put up a good fight mate, and when in doubt you can always do what everyone else does and use "high damage meta" as an excuse for the outcome ;)

Also is it possible for Riot to legitimately change Better Jungler's boards tag to read "Boards Jesus" like how yours says "Folksy Comms Boi" ? If possible I think that would be pretty great. And if trying to avoid offending religious folks, you could always switch it to "boards prophet"

I like this.

Theres no way in hell Riot would do that...

but I like it :P

EDIT: WTF THEY DID IT
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
THEY DID IT.
Holy shit! That's awesome dude! Congrats :)

BET YOU THOUGHT I WOULD BE TOO BUSY REPAIRING MICS AND DOING GENERAL TECH SUPPORT FOR STREAMS, BUT I READ BOARDS TOO. IT'S ME THE TECH DESK INTERN AND I'VE JUST PLAYED MY FIRST BOT GAME (AND WOULD'VE WON BUT I HAD A MIC REPAIR I WAS DOING AT THE SAME TIME). BUT NOW I'M READY TO GO. 

1V1 GAREN. I'M YOUR HUCKLEBERRY

My huckleberry xD 

I cant handle it dude, I wont be able to beat you. Lets save me the embarrassment and just give you the win.
I ACCEPT YOUR SURRENDER. YOU ARE A TRUE VIKING LORD. TTYL GOTTA FIX THIS DUDE'S MIC.

There are no words. Just laughter.
I would accept your surrender but i gotta go take a ... Wait is this on?

i'm telling the tech desk guy right now. he's a huge noob and is probably too scared

<queue maniacal laughter>

Oh! My mistake then, don't mind me :) It was still really fun to watch you two duke it out.

Haha that poor tech-desk guy XD

That's good, I'm glad it was in good fun and that you both have no hard feelings about it.
Tech Desk Vandetta When?!?

Boards Jesus, returning with a vengeance. However, I must warn you that unlike Cactopus, Meddler is actually good. So... good luck.

You might want to quit while you're ahead, though.
Honestly after I destroy Meddler, theres not much left for me. Not gunna fight the ACTUAL balance team.. thats just suicide.

> [{quoted}](name=Better Jungler,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=62aOJlZR,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2018-02-09T22:20:25.071+0000)
>
> Not gunna fight the ACTUAL balance team.. thats just suicide.

For who? 

{{sticker:poppy-wink}}
Inb4 they "hotfix" garen right before the match.
"Ultimate now makes the target enemy invincible until they die"
Another name whispers into your ear.... Phreak
followed by... Tons of Damage
Followed by... someone...  i dont actually know where to take this joke...
Ryze. Then Tryndamere.
It's not funny anymore tbh. You can't drag a meme out this long, it just loses its humor.

What a fool you are to assume this is a meme. 

I'm taking back whats mine. 

Get. Me. Meddler.
I dunno, did you watch the stream? It was pretty hype.

> [{quoted}](name=HalcyonDweller,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=62aOJlZR,comment-id=00010001,timestamp=2018-02-09T22:22:23.167+0000)
>
> I dunno, did you watch the stream? It was pretty hype.

I did watch it, and it was funny. If you drag a joke on like this then it gets stale.

It's not gonna be 'dragged on' if Meddler actually agrees to the match.

But whatever, agree to disagree I guess.

True, if meddler doesnt respond, this meme will die. 

If he does, then maybe it continues. 

The way I see it, we entertained around 150 people for a couple minutes, and had fun ourselves. So regardless of how "stale" the joke gets, if people enjoy it and we enjoy doing it, then it's going to keep happening:P If you disagree you can get it too. 

{{sticker:sg-syndra}}
Here's hoping he does respond :D It would be cool if this kept going. Might even be pretty great to make it a regular thing. Like once a month or something with a different Rioter :3
